title: So... I just purchased the physical copy of Fallout 4.
body: I buy the disks to save downloading as Australian internet is garbage. I put the disk in and wait, thirty minutes to install it, not bad. The thing randomly closes after two minutes and says 5GB/25GB at 274KB/s. How are companies putting 1/4th of a game and selling it? Wtf is this garbage, I could have bought the game online and saved $20... mfw.
